review_title: Lots of emails, not much action
pros: Pleasant mild-mannered people, very nice offices
cons: There was an awful lot of discussion - meetings, emails, conferences, working parties etc. - but not a lot of action. It was difficult to see what my team did that was useful to members of the organisation - which is disheartening when you work for a charity.

pros: Good benefits and salary for the charity sector. Very intelligent committed bunch of people. Good work-life balance. Nice offices in the heart of kings cross by the canal
cons: Projects can take a long time to come to fruition. Too much decision making by committee.

cons: Experience very dependent on individual line managers
